metadata.synopsis: Second time Astarion propositions the player to sleep with him - optional CRD between his act 1 and act 2 critical path romance scenes.The player starts to realise Astarion might have been just playing an act to seduce them the whole time, and that his affection for them might not be genuine. Bridges the gap before he confesses this in his act 2 romance, and says he wants to stop manipulating people and have a real relationship.Could either be triggered at the party, or any time before the act 2 scene, as long as you've slept with him before.If player agrees to meet up with Astarion later, it will show them meeting up at the bedroll when the player clicks to rest automatically if it's not at the party, if no other overnight scene is queued. If it's at the party, the player has to choose at the bedroll menu to meet up with him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book - Astarion - Recruit as CompanionOrigin Debug Book - Astarion - Act 1 - Romance (Second night) - Queue night.Click on Astarion

10.speaker: Astarion
10.text: Here's my little treat with their cheeks all flushed. You will come to my bed tonight, won't you?

44.speaker: Player
44.text: You don't have to ask twice.

4.speaker: Astarion
4.text: I'm amazed you managed to keep your mind clear enough to fight, I've been thinking about our last night together ceaselessly.

53.speaker: Astarion
53.text: I'll be in quite a spot of mortal peril if you let me keep distracting myself dreaming instead of doing.

41.speaker: Astarion
41.text: We can't have that, can we? It would be very dangerous.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: On second thought, maybe not tonight.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: 'A little treat'? You can do better than that.

61.speaker: Astarion
61.text: Oh, I certainly can, it would be my pleasure.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Very presumptuous. I'm undecided what I'll do tonight yet.

16.speaker: Astarion
16.text: Ah, you need a bit of enticing, let me see.

40.speaker: Astarion
40.text: All these accolades from the Tieflings are nothing compared to the sound of my name, cried from your lips.

3.speaker: Astarion
3.text: Every time I heard the Tieflings cry, I remembered how you sounded crying for me.

62.speaker: Astarion
62.text: Hmm, let me give it another go:

34.speaker: Astarion
34.text: Every part of your perfect body whispers temptation - it's as if the Gods made you just to ruin me.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: You're sweet, and sillier than I thought.

52.speaker: Astarion
52.text: I can go on all night with the flattery, but is that really all you want?

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Did these really work on Cazador's targets?

21.speaker: Astarion
21.text: Well, they worked on you last time, didn't they?

54.speaker: Astarion
54.text: How about if I said these little words... Everyone's favourite...

0.speaker: Astarion
0.context: NodeContext: Pretends to say it very sweetly and innocently

45.speaker: Astarion
45.text: Ah ha, but a rather beautiful lie, nonetheless.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: A little soon to say that, don't you think?

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Well, it can be true, if only for tonight.

32.speaker: Astarion
32.text: Now, as much as I relish standing around and saying all my favourite lines at you, I'd much rather we got to experience each others' full portfolio of talents once again.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: I'll come find you after everyone is asleep.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: I'll come find you after everyone is asleep.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: I'd love that, Astarion, but you know I can't. I'd burn you alive.

38.speaker: Astarion
38.text: Oh I don't know. It might be worth it.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: I don't think I really want this.

28.speaker: Astarion
28.text: I am, it's hard not to with you.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: So many honeyed words, as usual.

59.speaker: Astarion
59.text: Not half as sweet as when I tasted you.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Is that the best you can do?

7.speaker: Astarion
7.text: When I'm with you, I feel practically alive, yet I crave only to die again with you.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Sorry, I may want to spend some time with someone else.

9.speaker: Astarion
9.text: By all means, do something less exceptional, and think of me while you're doing it.

6.speaker: Astarion
6.text: If you don't remember how much you enjoyed it last time, I would like to try again, until you can think of nothing else.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Oh, I like you best. I can't help myself.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I'm sure we will get another chance soon. But not right now.

46.speaker: Astarion
46.text: I look forward to the day. Meanwhile, my hunger for you will only deepen.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I think it's better if we leave last time as a once-off.

56.speaker: Astarion
56.text: Well, well, excuse me while I die of a broken heart.

26.speaker: Astarion
26.text: In all honesty, it is a shame. That time was special to me. I've gotten on my back ten thousand times or more, and forgotten half of them.

23.speaker: Astarion
23.text: But you... you I'll remember. Have a fine evening, dear.
